description: Source definitions with type, schedule, and rate limits. Matches FinalStrategy.md execution schedule.

serpapi-discovery.scheduleDescription: Every 3 days at 8:00 AM (to stay within free tier)

serpapi-aggregators.scheduleDescription: Twice daily at 8:00 AM and 8:00 PM
serpapi-aggregators.purpose: Discover job postings through major job aggregators
queries: site:ca.linkedin.com/jobs/view ("software engineer" OR "software developer" OR "web developer" OR "frontend developer" OR "backend developer" OR "full stack developer") ("Toronto" OR "Mississauga" OR "Vancouver")
site:ca.indeed.com/viewjob ("software engineer" OR "software developer" OR "web developer" OR "full stack developer") ("Toronto" OR "Mississauga" OR "Vancouver")
site:wellfound.com/jobs ("full stack engineer" OR "software engineer" OR "frontend" OR "backend") ("Canada" OR "Toronto" OR "Vancouver" OR "Remote")
site:glassdoor.ca/job-listing ("software engineer" OR "software developer" OR "backend developer" OR "frontend developer") ("Toronto" OR "Mississauga" OR "Vancouver")
site:eluta.ca ("software engineer" OR "software developer" OR "web developer") ("Toronto" OR "Mississauga" OR "Ontario" OR "Vancouver" OR "BC")

site:simplify.jobs/p ("software engineer" OR "software developer" OR "web developer" OR "frontend developer" OR "backend developer" OR "full stack developer") ("Toronto" OR "Mississauga" OR "Vancouver" OR "Canada")

site:jobbank.gc.ca ("software engineer" OR "software developer" OR "web developer" OR "frontend developer" OR "backend developer" OR "full stack developer") ("Toronto" OR "Mississauga" OR "Vancouver" OR "Canada" OR "Remote")

site:careerbeacon.com/en/job ("software engineer" OR "software developer" OR "web developer" OR "frontend developer" OR "backend developer" OR "full stack developer") ("Toronto" OR "Mississauga" OR "Vancouver" OR "Canada" OR "Remote")

serpapi-underground.scheduleDescription: Twice daily at 8:00 AM and 8:00 PM
serpapi-underground.purpose: Discover hiring signals from non-traditional channels
queries: site:news.ycombinator.com who is hiring canada software
